trans-unit.source: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.
Converts an assembly to a COM type library.
For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.
The assembly to convert.
The file name of the resulting type library.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags"></xref> value indicating any special settings.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink"></xref> interface implemented by the caller.
An object that implements the `ITypeLib` interface.
Converts a COM type library to an assembly.
For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.
The object that implements the `ITypeLib` interface.
The file name of the resulting assembly.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags"></xref> value indicating any special settings.
<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink"></xref> interface implemented by the caller.
A `byte` array containing the public key.
A <xref href="System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair"></xref> object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.
If `true`, the interfaces require link time checks for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode"></xref> permission.
If `false`, the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.
An <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder"></xref> object containing the converted type library.
Converts a COM type library to an assembly.
For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.
The object that implements the `ITypeLib` interface.
The file name of the resulting assembly.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags"></xref> value indicating any special settings.
<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink"></xref> interface implemented by the caller.
A `byte` array containing the public key.
A <xref href="System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair"></xref> object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.
The namespace for the resulting assembly.
The version of the resulting assembly.
If `null`, the version of the type library is used.
An <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder"></xref> object containing the converted type library.
Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.
The GUID of the type library.
The major version number of the type library.
The minor version number of the type library.
The LCID of the type library.
On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.
On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.
`true` if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise `false`.
